agenda.description: ** REVISION ** HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF FORMAL MEETING COMMITTEE: Judiciary & Civil Jurisprudence TIME & DATE: Upon lunch recess Thursday, April 25, 2019 PLACE: House Chamber, Desk # 21 CHAIR: Rep. Jeff Leach ** MEETING CANCELED ** The committee will meet to discuss pending business. Notice of this meeting was announced from the house floor. ** See Committee Coordinator for previous versions ** of the schedule, if applicable.
